headline: S&P 500 Gains & Losses Today: Broadcom Stock, Chipmaker Shares Surge; Casino Stocks Fall
summary: A chipmaker became the latest to enjoy a bounce after announcing an AI deal on Monday, Oct. 13, 2025, while storms in a key region weighed on casino and resort operators.

headline: WBD rebuffs Paramount Skydance's bid, casino stocks fall on weak data
summary: Here are some of the top stories on Wall Street during Monday's trading session: Warner Bros. Discovery (WBD) and Paramount Skydance (PSKY) latest, OpenAI (OPAI.PVT) and Broadcom (AVGO) partnership, and weak casino data weighs on Wynn Resorts (WYNN) and L.V. Sands (LVS).
